enb_long_title: Eighth Conference of the Parties to the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change
section_title: Issues Relating to Implementation of Protocol Article 2.3
sentences: On Friday, 25 October, Parties discussed issues relating to possible workshops.
Saudi Arabia argued for a draft decision requesting the Secretariat to analyze the adverse effects of P&Ms on developing countries.
Chair Thorgeirsson said he would undertake consultations on this issue. On Tuesday, 29 October, Chair Thorgeirsson reported that consultations had been unsuccessful.
